trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tonawanda
There were no other sightings in Tonawanda on or around December 13th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailson my way to work i saw for the 2nd time a orb glowing white in color like the moon looked to be in the atmosphere about a 2 inch round orb flying at a incredible speed maybe 5 seconds at the most of sight. it was traveling south east. the first one i saw was 2 months prior same thing only 3 inches maybe traveling north west. it wasn't a falling star was much lower looking to be in the atmosphere. what am i seeing?
